title: ISMCornerReliefData.CenterOnBendLines
description: Gets and sets whether to center this corner relative to the bend lines.
returns: True to center relative to the bend lines, false to not
remarks:
This property is valid only if:
ICornerReliefFeatureData::CornerType
is set to
swCornerReliefBendType_e
.swCornerReliefBendType_TwoBend
- And -
ISMCornerReliefData::ReliefType
is set to
swCornerReliefType_e
.:
swCornerCircularRelief
swCornerObroundRelief
swCornerRectangularRelief
